member.name: M:Goedel.Cryptography.Cryptography.Initialize(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Perform initialization of the Goedel.Cryptography portable class with delegates to the .NET framework methods.
member.param: If true, the application will be initialized in test/debug mode.

member.name: T:Goedel.Cryptography.CryptographyOSX
member.summary: Initialize for the Linux style key store

member.name: M:Goedel.Cryptography.CryptographyOSX.Initialize(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Perform initialization of the Goedel.Cryptography portable class with delegates to the .NET framework methods.
member.param: If true initialize the system in test mode so that settings may be tested and cleared without disrupting user work.
